name: MatrixAsciiRenderOptions
summary: Rendering options for ASCII matrix output.

methods.name: WithQuietZone
methods.summary: Sets the quiet zone size in modules.

methods.name: WithModuleWidth
methods.summary: Sets the module width in characters.

methods.name: WithModuleHeight
methods.summary: Sets the module height in rows.

methods.name: WithScale
methods.summary: Sets an additional scale multiplier applied to both module width and height.

methods.name: WithDark
methods.summary: Sets the character(s) used for dark modules.

methods.name: WithLight
methods.summary: Sets the character(s) used for light modules.

methods.name: WithUnicodeBlocks
methods.summary: Enables or disables Unicode block glyphs when defaults are used.

methods.name: WithInvert
methods.summary: Enables or disables inverted output (dark/light swapped).

methods.name: WithAnsiColors
methods.summary: Enables or disables ANSI color escape codes.

methods.name: WithAnsiTrueColor
methods.summary: Enables or disables ANSI truecolor (24-bit) output.

methods.name: WithAnsiDarkColor
methods.summary: Sets the ANSI color for dark modules.

methods.name: WithAnsiLightColor
methods.summary: Sets the ANSI color for light modules.

methods.name: WithAnsiColorizeLight
methods.summary: Enables or disables ANSI colorization of light modules.

properties.name: Scale
properties.summary: Additional scale multiplier applied to both module width and height.

properties.name: UseUnicodeBlocks
properties.summary: When true, prefers Unicode block glyphs (for example, █) when defaults are used.

properties.name: Invert
properties.summary: When true, swaps dark and light output.

properties.name: UseAnsiColors
properties.summary: When true, emits ANSI color escape codes for dark (and optionally light) modules.

properties.name: UseAnsiTrueColor
properties.summary: When true, uses 24-bit ANSI colors; otherwise maps to ANSI 256-color.

properties.name: AnsiColorizeLight
properties.summary: When true, also colorizes light modules; otherwise leaves them uncolored.
